name: FIRST
description: FIRST, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: FIRST).

inputs.name: Affine file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Affine matrix to use (e.g. img2std.mat) (does not re-run registration).

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A unicode string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Brain extracted
inputs.description: A boolean. Input structural image is already brain-extracted.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Input data file.

inputs.name: List of specific structures
inputs.description: A list of at least 1 items which are a unicode string. Runs only on the specified structures (e.g. l_hipp, r_hippl_accu, r_accu, l_amyg, r_amygl_caud, r_caud, l_pall, r_palll_puta, r_puta, l_thal, r_thal, brstem.

inputs.name: Method
inputs.description: 'auto' or 'fast' or 'none'. Method must be one of auto, fast, none, or it can be entered using the 'method_as_numerical_threshold' input.

inputs.name: Method as numerical threshold
inputs.description: A float. Specify a numerical threshold value or use the 'method' input to choose auto, fast, or none.

inputs.name: No cleanup
inputs.description: A boolean. Input structural image is already brain-extracted.

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A file name. Output data file.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

output-files.name: Bvars
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Bvars for each subcortical region.

output-files.name: Original segmentations
output-files.description: An existing file name. 3d image file containing the segmented regions as integer values. uses cma labelling.

output-files.name: Segmentation file
output-files.description: An existing file name. 4d image file containing a single volume per segmented region.

output-files.name: Vtk surfaces
output-files.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. Vtk format meshes for each subcortical region.
